page.title: 01Fearn,an introduction.
page.content: Our particular grid area could best be described as "rural".Within this area is some of the most fertile farming land in Scotland.The land is low-lying and the climate fairly mild.Farming was the most important activity in the area, but now,people work at some of the more up-to-date, modern industries.The number of people living in the area has increased and more people are buying or building their own homes.Within Fearn itself,there has been some new council housing built.Arabella has no council houses.There are many roads which pass through the grid leading to some of the neighbouring villages and linking us with the nearest large settlement,Tain.
